votebox.middle.view

Interface IViewFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AWTViewFactory

    public interface IViewFactory
    Use an instance of this class to construct a view and images that work with the constructed view.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IViewImage makeImage(java.lang.String path, boolean isVolatile)
      Construct an image object that can be drawn in views that are constructed with this factory.
      IView makeView()
      Construct a new view.

    • Method Detail

      • makeView

        IView makeView()
        Construct a new view.
        Returns:
        This method returns a newly constructed view.

      • makeImage

        IViewImage makeImage(java.lang.String path,
                   boolean isVolatile)
        Construct an image object that can be drawn in views that are constructed with this factory.
        Parameters:
        path - Load the image's bytes from this path
        isVolatile -
        Returns:
        This method returns an image object which can be used in views that are constructed with this factory.
